snippet: Under the terms of the deal, Bristol-Myers Squibb will pay $26 a share, 163 percent above Inhibitex's closing price on Friday.
abstract: Under the terms of the deal, Bristol-Myers Squibb will pay $26 a share, 163 percent above Inhibitex's closing price on Friday.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Bristol-Myers to Acquire Inhibitex for $2.5 Billion
headline.print_headline: Bristol-Myers Agrees to Buy Inhibitex for $2.5 Billion Cash
